data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The values and institutions of the Revolution dominate French politics to this day. The Revolution resulted ____ the ____ of ____ feudal ____, ____ emancipation ____ the ____, ____ greater ____ of ____ property, the ____ of ____ privileges ____ noble ____ and ____ establishment ____ equality. The French Revolution differed from other revolutions in being not merely national, for it aimed at benefiting all humanity.
data.partBlankContent: The values and institutions of the Revolution dominate French politics to this day. The Revolution resulted i_ the suppr______ of t__ feudal sys___, t__ emancipation o_ the indiv_____, t__ greater divi____ of lan___ property, the abol_____ of t__ privileges o_ noble bi___ and t__ establishment o_ equality. The French Revolution differed from other revolutions in being not merely national, for it aimed at benefiting all humanity.
data.answer: 革命的价值观和制度至今仍主导着法国政治。革命的结果是封建制度的废除，个人的解放，土地产权的更大分割，贵族特权的废除和平等的确立。法国大革命与其他革命的不同之处在于它不仅仅是一个国家的革命，它的目标是造福全人类。
